word: COME TOGETHER TO PRAY FOR THE CONVERSION OF SOULS.—If in one place there are only two or three who know the truth, let them form themselves into a band of workers. Let them keep their bond of union unbroken, pressing together in love and unity, encouraging one another to advance, each gaining courage and strength from the assistance of the others. . . . As they work and pray in Christ’s name, their numbers will increase.—(Testimonies for the Church, vol. 7, 21.)
